data.name: Scion of the Blazing Sun
data.passiveDescription: After a Charged Attack hits an opponent, a Sunfire Arrow will descend upon the opponent hit, dealing {{60//75//90//105//120%}} ATK as DMG, and applying the Heartsearer effect to the opponent damaged by said Arrow for 10s. Opponents affected by Heartsearer take {{28//35//42//49//56%}} more Charged Attack DMG from the wielder. A Sunfire Arrow can be triggered once every 10s.
